import "../css/timkiem.css"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import logonobr from "../logo no-background.png"; import logo from "../Logo.png"; import { Link, useNavigate, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; const FindProducts = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); const [eproducts, seteProducts] = useState([]); const [Phone, setPhone] = useState(''); const [coutcart, setCountCart] = useState(0); const [shownProducts, setShownProducts] = useState([]); const [searchWeight, setSearchWeight] = useState(); const [totalProducts, setTotalProducts] = useState(0); const location = useLocation(); const getTotalQuantity = () => { let totalQuantity = 0; eproducts.forEach(product => { totalQuantity += parseInt(product.So_luong); }); return totalQuantity; }; useEffect = (() => { const fetchData = async (Phone) => { try { const response = await axios.get(`http://localhost:3308/getcart/${Phone}`); seteProducts(response.data); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching data', error); } }; fetchData() }) const loadMoreProducts = () => { setShownProducts(prev => prev + 6); }; const formatPrice = (price) => { return (price || 0).toLocaleString("vi-VN"); }; // Hàm xử lý tìm kiếm sản phẩm const handleSearch = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { // Lấy danh sách sản phẩm từ server const response = await axios.get("http://localhost:3308/getproducts"); const setProducts = response.data; setSearchWeight(e) } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching products:", error); } }; // Hàm lọc sản phẩm dựa trên trọng lượng const filterProductsByWeight = (products, weight) => { if (!weight) { return products; // Trả về toàn bộ danh sách nếu trọng lượng không được chỉ định } return products.filter(product => product.Trong_luong === weight); }; console.log(products); return (
handleSearch(e.target.value)} >
navigate("/login")} className="text-black" >
navigate(`/giohang/${Phone}`)} className="position-relative text-black" > {getTotalQuantity()} unread messages

  • navigate("/Artificial")} > Kim cương nhân tạo
  • navigate("`/cart/${Phone}`")} > Đơn đặt hàng

  2. navigate("/Artificial")} > Kim cương nhân tạo

); }; export default FindProducts;
